statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, state FROM customers WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE city='San Francisco';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE state='California' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state='Texas' AND city='Austin';
SELECT first_name, address FROM customers WHERE country='Canada' AND state='Ontario';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id=1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, notes FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Meeting';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'call' AND notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, email, phone, address FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM interactions INNER JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interactions.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customer_name, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_name
SELECT campaign_name, budget, (end_date - start_date) AS duration FROM campaigns
